analysis.description:
DigitalGame.sendInviteDividends has external calls inside a loop:
	- userRecomms[j].transfer(msg.value * GENERATION_REWARD[j] / 100) (/unique_chucks/7/0xe8a6d8e9a08281b0e235ad54ddedd98920517dff.sol#271-274)

DigitalGame.issueReward has external calls inside a loop:
	- WaitAwardBets[m].addr.transfer(reward) (/unique_chucks/7/0xe8a6d8e9a08281b0e235ad54ddedd98920517dff.sol#422-423)
Parameter '_RECOMM_ADDR' of DigitalGame.setDefaultRecommAddr (/unique_chucks/7/0xe8a6d8e9a08281b0e235ad54ddedd98920517dff.sol) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_SPARE_RECOMM_ADDR' of DigitalGame.setSpareRecommAddr (/unique_chucks/7/0xe8a6d8e9a08281b0e235ad54ddedd98920517dff.sol) is not in mixedCase
